title: Paper Accepted by ICES'25

title: EPA Research Grant Award
content: Alex was awarded the EPA Research Grant to support his work on advanced water filtration technologies.

title: Graduation from UNNC
content: Shuhao graduated from University of Nottingham Ningbo China with First Class Honours in Mechanical Engineering. Thanks to all the professors, senior students and friends who helped him in the past four years.
